programme.desc: This confrontation between good and evil stars Kevin Costner as federal agent Eliot Ness, Robert De Niro as gangland kingpin Al Capone, and Sean Connery as Malone, the cop who teaches Ness how to beat the mob: shoot fast and shoot first.

programme.title: Running Scared, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: In the fast-paced crime drama Running Scared, Paul Walker plays a low-level mobster who, in order to save his family, must recover a gun used in a mob hit before it's found by his bosses or the cops.

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: Snatch, (2000, Thriller)
programme.desc: A diamond heist gone haywire launches gangsters, bookies, and a dog on a rollicking ride through the rugged world of bare-knuckle boxing in search of the missing stone. Critically acclaimed comedy from Guy Richie.

programme.title: Go, (1999, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ronna needs to make some extra cash. Simon wants to escape to Vegas for the weekend. Adam and Zack want to stay out of trouble. But it's not just another night in the life of these unusual characters.

programme.title: Good Burger, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: Kel are serving up laughs! They're the good guys in Good Burger, a zany comedy inspired by the popular Kel routine from Nickelodeon's hit series All That.

programme.title: Tropic Thunder, (2008, Comedy)
programme.desc: Ben Stiller, Jack Black and Robert Downey Jr. lead an ensemble cast in 'Tropic Thunder,' an action comedy about a group of self-absorbed actors who set out to make the most expensive war film.

programme.title: The Girl in the Spider's Web, (2018, Thriller)

programme.title: Panic Room, (2002, Thriller)
programme.desc: When her home is invaded by three armed robbers, a divorced woman and her young daughter hide in their specially designed panic room but end up in a deadly cat-and-mouse game anyway.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Coles career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Thunderheart, (1992, Thriller)
programme.desc: Val Kilmer, Sam Shepard and Graham Greene star in this murder mystery filled with style and suspense. Kilmer stars as Ray Levoi, a hotshot FBI agent who's thrust into a strange new world when he is sent to solve a murder on an Indian reservation.

programme.title: Days of Thunder, (1990, Action)
programme.desc: Discovered by businessman Tim Daland, Cole is teamed with legendary crew chief and car-builder Harry Hogge to race for the Winston Cup at the Daytona 500. A crash nearly ends Coles career and he must turn to a beautiful doctor to regain his nerve.

programme.title: Amistad, (1997, History)
programme.desc: AMISTAD is about a 1839 mutiny onboard a slave ship that is traveling towards the Northeast Coast of America. Much of the story involves a court-room drama about the slave who led the revolt.

programme.title: Bound, (1995, Thriller)
programme.desc: Caesars a guy who launders money for the mob. Whats the last thing that would come between a sleazy wise guy like Caesar and that money? A couple of women with brains to die for and bodies to match.

programme.title: Showgirls, (1995, Drama)
programme.desc: Seduction, passion and power struggles unfold as the creators of Basic Instinct blow the lid off the seemingly glamorous world of Las Vegas showdancing in this controversial film that stars Elizabeth Berkley.

programme.title: The Mechanic, (1972, Action)
programme.desc: In a role that powered him to stardom, Charles Bronson is an underworld executioner who turns murder into an art form in this ultimate crime chiller.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express, (1974, Thriller)
programme.desc: Famous detective Hercule Poirot is on the Orient Express, but the train is caught in the snow. When one of the passengers is discovered murdered, Poirot immediately starts investigating.

programme.title: Brannigan, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: John Wayne stars as Chicago Police Lieutenant Jim Brannigan and Richard Attenborough co-stars as British policeman Cmdr. Swann in this action-comedy. Brannigan teams up in the U.K. with Cmdr Swann to escort a crime boss back to the U.S.

programme.title: The Killer Elite, (1975, Action)
programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.title: Three Days of the Condor, (1975, Thriller)
programme.desc: A mild-mannered CIA researcher, paid to read books, returns from lunch to find all of his co-workers assassinated. "Condor" must find out who did this and get in from the cold before the hitmen get him.

programme.title: Annie Hall, (1977, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen is in prime form in this celebrated comedy and 1977 Best Picture Oscar-winner in which he portrays a highly neurotic comedy writer who falls head-over-heels in love with a naive small-town girl (Diane Keaton) who aspires to be a singer.

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: The Return of the Pink Panther, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: The hilarious, accidentally brilliant Inspector Clouseau once again takes on his archenemy, the insane Dreyfus, as he plots to control the world.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Kaiba are on a rescue mission to save their friends. But along the way, all their worries and secrets are revealed as they relive the troubles they've faced and will face in the future.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's friend versus friend as Marik mind controls Joey to duel against Yugi. The loser will be dragged into the ocean to sleep with the fishes!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Though Joey decimates Yugi's life points, Yugi can't bring himself to attack his dear friend. Yugi summons Joey's favorite monster Red-Eyes Black Dragon to bring Joey back to his senses.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi starts to break Marik's spell over Joey, but he now must duel without the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: There's only one minute left in the duel before the loser is sent plummeting to the depths of the sea. Will these best friends actually send each other to their doom?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the battle of the ghouls as Bakura unleashes his army of ghosts against Bonz's zealous zombies for the right to enter the Battle City finals. But for whom will the final bell toll when this duel is played in the Shadow Realm?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the game of love as Hollywood heartthrob Jean-Claude Magnum challenges Mai to a duel in order to win her hand in marriage.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Let the Battle City finals begin! The eight finalists have their skill and endurance put to the ultimate test in a dueling arena thousands of feet in the sky.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the first duel of the Battle City finals as Yugi squares off against the evil spirit of the Millennium Ring who possessed Bakura. Yugi quickly disposes of Bakura's grotesque ghouls, but Bakura has a sinister strategy straight from the graveyard.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 1

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura activates Destiny Board, which will cause Yugi to lose automatically in five turns. If that's not bad enough, Bakura's Dark Sanctuary damages Yugi's Life Points every time Yugi attacks. Unable to attack and running out of time, Yugi's trapped.
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 2

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's Slifer the Sky Dragon is about to unleash the final blow to win the duel, but Bakura may not survive the blast from the almighty Egyptian God Monster. Will Yugi attack and advance in the finals or will he surrender to save Bakura's life?
programme.sub-title: The Dark Spirit Revealed: Yugi Vs. Bakura Part 3

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origin of the Egyptian God Cards is finally revealed. The mysterious Shadi takes Yugi on a journey back in time to the creation of Duel Monsters and the dangerous powers it released.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the second duel of the Battle City finals, Odion, disguised as Marik, befuddles Joey with numerous traps to bring the duel to a stalemate. However, Joey has Giant Trunade, the perfect counter to Odion's strategy.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion's Embodiments of Apophis run roughshod over Joey's monsters and his Life Points. Can Joey effectively utilize the monsters he won earlier in the tournament, or is he too flustered to mount a successful counterattack?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's a feeding frenzy as Odion's Mystical Beast Selket devours Joey's monsters to morph into greater and powerful stages of evolution! How can Joey defeat Selket when it ingests Joey's monsters whenever they're summoned on to the field?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Odion uses a phony Egyptian God Card to summon the third Egyptian God Monster, The Winged Dragon of Ra, targeted to annihilate the rest of Joey's Life Points.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The third duel of the Battle City finals between Mai and Marik is no ordinary duel; it's a battle in the dreaded Shadow Realm where losing Life Points equals losing your memories.
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 1: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Mai loses more memories under Marik's relentless assault, she loses confidence in her dueling abilities. Will Yugi and friends' never-ending support bring her back to victory, or will her shattered mind be trapped in the Shadow Realm for eternity?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 2: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mai gains control of Marik's The Winged Dragon of Ra, but she's unable to decipher how to unleash its massively powerful abilities. Can Mai solve the mystery of the Egyptian God Card before Marik solves it himself?
programme.sub-title: Mind Game Part 3: Mai vs. Marik

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: In the fourth duel of the Battle City finals, Kaiba's mystery opponent is Ishizu. With the power of her Millennium Necklace, Ishizu can see the future, including every card Kaiba is planning to play.
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 1: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Ishizu, using the magic of her Millennium Necklace, has already seen the outcome of the duel: she will defeat Kaiba with sacrifice's blast! How can Kaiba win when it's predestined that he will lose? Kaiba must change the future!
programme.sub-title: A Duel with Destiny Part 2: Kaiba vs. Ishizu

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Marik's evil grows, Ishizu reveals the secrets of her bloodline: How did Marik transform from a kind child into a power-hungry tyrant out for world domination? Can Yugi save Marik from the edge of darkness, or is he already beyond salvation?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With their previous pact broken, Bakura duels Marik for the right to control the Millennium Rod and Millennium Ring, with the loser being trapped inside the Shadow Realm forever. To tip the odds, Bakura gains an unexpected ally another Marik?
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 1: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Bakura and good Marik summon The Winged Dragon of Ra, ready to blast and banish evil Marik into the Shadow Realm. But The Winged Dragon of Ra has more than one special ability, and evil Marik knows how to use them all.
programme.sub-title: Showdown in the Shadows Part 2: Marik Vs. Bakura

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Kaiba's blimp is hijacked by a mysterious boy named Noah and his henchmen - five familiar foes from Yugi and Kaiba's past who are out for revenge!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The first to duel under the all-new Deck Master System is Yugi against Big 1 Gansley's Deepsea Warrior! Can Yugi master the complex new rules, or will the rules master him?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Yugi struggles to make heads or tails of the Deck Master System, Big 1 uses his Deck Master ability to send all of Yugi's attacks right back! How can Yugi defeat an opponent when his attacks take away his own life points?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi's running out of life points, but can his cute little Deck Master Kuriboh unleash his furry fury to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Prepare for a feathered fight when Ta squares off against Big 2 Crump's Nightmare Penguin where the loser will be trapped forever in a block of ice!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: As Ta's body turns more and more into a giant popsicle, can she keep her brain from freezing to find a way to melt Big 2's strategy? Or will Big 2's penguin horde waddle all over her?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey squares off against the judicial jerk Big 3 Johnson who takes the Deck Master form of Judge Man! How can Joey defeat a foe who can destroy Joey's monsters at will?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Just when Joey seems to gain the upper hand, he hits the longest streak of bad luck in the history of mankind! Has Joey's fortunes finally run out, or is a crooked judge ignoring the rules of the law?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Big 4 Nezbitt challenges Duke, Tristan, and Serenity for the right to gain control of three bodies at once! Will Serenity's errors cost her team the ultimate price when Tristan and Duke can't cover for her mistakes?

programme.title: The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack's Fierce Attack!

programme.title: After being aggressively attacked by Jack's fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!

programme.title: With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant's wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat's Rescue Operation!

programme.title: The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy's team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Saying Goodbye and Descending from the Elephant! Setting Out to Take Back Sanji!

programme.title: Luffy's team sets out from Zou on their way to win back Sanji! But they didn't realize there is one more crewmember than they have bargained for!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Princess Vivi and Princess Shirahoshi!

programme.title: Carrot stows away! And settles in with the Straw Hats as they make their way to rescue Sanji! Meanwhile, in the Sakura Kingdom, Dalton and Kureha are getting ready for the Reverie so as their former enemy in his newly-built kingdom
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the Reverie! Rebecca and the Sakura Kingdom!

programme.title: News of the raid on the Revolutionary Army reaches Luffy! But that's the least of their worries as they face a storm and a sudden lack of provisions! Meanwhile, Emperor Kaido fumes with anger at the reckless generation of upstarts!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Kaido Returns! An Imminent Threat to the Worst Generation!

programme.title: Sneaking in to the Navy island facility to replenish their food supply, Luffy and the others risk being caught out in the open! Will their infamy make them easy to spot by the hotheaded Navy recruits around them?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Hungry Front! Luffy and the Navy Rookies!

programme.title: The jig is up as Luffy and the others make a daring dash to avoid the furious Navy! Can they escape without having to turn to fight - and after they've had a chance to raid the cabinets for food?
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Implacable Three! A Big Chase After the Straw Hats!

programme.title: Making a mad dash for the Submerge with the food they stole, Luffy and the others have to get through some of the Navy's upstart soldiers! Grount, whose arm holds incredible power, summons his training to challenge Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Devil's Fist! A Show Down! Luffy vs. Grount!

programme.title: The Straw Hats continue to suffer from blazing heat and a perilous food crisis! As the seas finally calm, fishing is their only hope! Meanwhile, Sanji arrives in Big Mom's territory and keeps his cool - until he sees his bride-to-be!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Sanji's Homecoming! Into Big Mom's Territory!

programme.title: Luffy is in danger as the venomous fish poison courses through his body! With no antidotes on board, the Straw Hats must rely on a mysterious ship for help - a ship that bears a truly surprising crew!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: On the edge of life and death, Luffy's only hope rests with Sanji's siblings! But even though they refuse to share an antidote, they may be able to save Luffy's life yet, giving him enough energy to plunge right back into trouble.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Poison Crisis! Luffy and Reiju!

programme.title: Arriving on Cacao Island, Luffy and Chopper are in heaven as everything before their eyes is edible!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Totto Land! Emperor Big Mom Appears!

programme.title: The Straw Hats confront Pudding - the fiance of Sanji! But when they challenge her for Sanji's heart, her answer shocks them! Meanwhile, an ominous and mysterious message may spell doom for the Straw Hats.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Daughter! Sanji's fiance - Pudding!

programme.title: The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search of a specific pastry!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Massive Attack! Mom's Hunger Pangs!

programme.title: Big Mom rampages through the Whole Cake Island in search for sweets - but when the kitchen can't prepare them fast enough, her own son steps in to curb the carnage, with deadly results.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Capital City Falls?! Big Mom and Jimbei!

programme.title: As the Straw Hats draw closer to the Whole Cake Island, Pedro shares his sordid past in Big Mom's territory - and hatches a plan to win back Sanji and take an item of great worth from the Emperor!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Emperor's Castle! Arriving at the Whole Cake Island!

programme.title: Brook and Pedro head out in a submersible to infiltrate Big Mom's stronghold! Meanwhile, Luffy, Nami, Chopper and Carrot head into the island chasing the image of Sanji, only to be distracted by the endless supply of sweets and a second Luffy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mysterious Forest Full of Candies! Luffy vs. Luffy?!

programme.title: Lost in the bewildering woods and chasing after Sanji, Nami and the others find there's more than meets the eye in this upside down part of the Whole Cake Island! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his brother!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Mom's Assassin! Luffy and the Seducing Woods!

programme.title: Luffy continues to move through the mysterious and dangerous woods, unaware of the danger that lurks in the trees! Meanwhile, Sanji confronts his father as the wounds of his childhood are laid bare!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Seafaring Kingdom! Germa's King Judge!

programme.title: Sanji faces off against his father in a duel! His powerful kicks aim at protecting his hands, but the Germa Family has more in store for him yet! Meanwhile, Luffy goes deeper into the Seducing Woods and falls for their powerful illusions!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle Between Father and Son! Judge vs. Sanji!

programme.title: Big Mom has Caesar Clown at her whims - and despite his bilking her out of countless amounts of money - she is ready to continue her pursuit of maniacal world control!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Giant Ambition! Big Mom and Caesar!

programme.title: Finally, Nami finds Luffy and recounts her harrowing tale of battling Brulee! Meanwhile, the mysterious half-buried man comes clean about his true identity! But this must all be put aside when one of Mom's most powerful generals comes calling!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Land of Souls! Mom's Fatal Ability!

programme.title: The identity of the enigmatic Pound, the man half-buried in the woods, is revealed, but his deep connection to Big Mom might not be enough to save him! Nami's past exploits, however, hold the key to keeping Mom's minions at bay!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Top Officer! The Sweet 3 General Cracker Appears!

programme.title: Luffy squares off against Cracker, one of the Sweet 3 Generals, as Nami learns the truth about others in the Worst Generation who have come before to challenge Big Mom!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Enemy Worth 800 million! Luffy vs. Thousand Armed Cracker!

programme.title: Luffy continues to fight against Cracker, whose powers to manipulate his surroundings may prove more troublesome than he had thought! Meanwhile, Brook and Pedro infiltrate the Whole Cake Island - and must hatch a plan to avoid getting caught!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An All-out Duel! Gear Four vs. the Bis-Bis Ability

programme.title: The wind starts to go out of Luffy's sails as he fights an endless army of Biscuit Warriors! Meanwhile, the oldest two Vinsmoke brothers come home from a war to see their long-missing young brother Sanji.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The First and the Second Join! The Vinsmoke Family!

programme.title: Luffy starts to run out of steam as the Biscuit Warriors keep multiplying! If he can buy himself 10 minutes to recharge
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Benefactor's Life! Sanji and Owner Zeff!

programme.title: Luffy needs just 10 minutes to recharge! Nami comes to rescue with the help of the Homies! Meanwhile, Sanji learns the terrible truth of Germa's power - and his father's dark history!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: An Angry Sanji! The Secret of Germa 66!

programme.title: Nami challenges Cracker on her own! During the all-out fight, she loses her advantage and is close to defeat. Can Luffy bounce back in time? Meanwhile, Sanji's tragic childhood is made clear.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Past that He Let Go of! Vinsmoke Sanji!

programme.title: The terrible history of Sanji's family continue to unfold. From a rare moment of compassion, he is able to escape, only to face his father's cruelty before setting out on his own.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To the East Blue! Sanji's Resolute Departure!

programme.title: Luffy is in an all-out, all-you-can-eat battle! As Cracker's endless stream of Biscuit Warriors marches on, Luffy's endless appetite is put to the test. Meanwhile, Reiju helps Sanji to straighten himself out before he meets his fiance.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Battle of Limits! Luffy and the Infinite Biscuits!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the Golden Bell, symbol of the monarchy of Beltenberg and precious tourist attraction. However, the bell that sparkles in the belfry is just a brass replica.
programme.sub-title: Fujiko, Men are A Sorry Lot!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Zenigata is taken hostage from ICPO headquarters. The terrorists demand to swap him with their boss Napoleon XI, but ICPO refuses. Since Zenigata is no further use to them, the terrorists are bound to kill him; but Lupin is to the rescue?

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Smith Gang hit-man company was once the best in the business, but they're suffering now from tough competition. Though the company chairman Smith considers running TV ads to revive his business, he can't think of a good way to do it.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Though Joe Spade was once a formidable hitman of renown and Jigen's sharpshooter coach, he now comes to beg for Jigen's help; he had gotten old, flubbed a hit contract, and is now on the run.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: ICPO Bureau Chief Jasmine is an able commissioner. She uses the governor to spur Zenigata into action, as she has a secret plan to arrest Lupin. But Jasmine's plan is to make this mission her very last at ICPO so she could get married.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Nightlight Mask murdered the Duke of Le Mond and stole his diamonds. ICPO is having trouble solving the case, so they induct mystery author Conan Dorill as a special inspector. Dorill deduces that the true identity of Nightlight Mask is Lupin.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: On a night of thunder and rain, a man gives Lupin a doll. The next day there is a news report that a diamond called the Phoenix's Tear had been stolen. Lupin's been caught on security cameras, but he has no recollection of having done the deed.
programme.sub-title: When the Devil Calls to Lupin

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin's target is the Vatican Crown, located at the North Pole. He devises a plan to thwart pesky Fujiko, which is to relocate penguins at the South Pole to the North Pole.
programme.sub-title: Lupin's North Pole, South Pole Adventures

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The World Crime Prevention Devices Association has developed the "killer safe" that sent many safe crackers to their graves. But Lupin takes the challenge to steal what it guards.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin crashes crime boss Markane's masquerade party, but the party was just a ruse to entrap Lupin. Lupin gets hung by rope in the dark and is made the target of Markane's murder game in ten rounds, of which players have to hit the target.
programme.sub-title: The Badder A Guy, The More Villainous He Is

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin gets called out to New York where he rescues a girl hunted by an organization called Red Spider. Lupin does everything he can to help the poor girl suffering from amnesia; he tries hypnosis on her but to no avail, he gets hypnotized instead.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Old man Piccolo had taught Lupin the art of thievery 15 years ago. Learning that his widowed wife had all of her belongings impounded by the police, Lupin promises her to get them all back.
programme.sub-title: The Merry Widow and the Robber's Quartette

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew sneak into Peking's Imperial Palace Museum to steal Emperor Shi's jade Mahjong set, but winds up getting chased by a gang.
programme.sub-title: Operation INVADER at the Great Wall of China

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Look who is flying above New York; it's Superman! All he does is fly around, but the town is in a panic because of his performance. In the meantime, a lot of banks get robbed.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin steals a statue called the Stone Child from the Metropolitan Art Museum; he and Fujiko make their getaway in a Cessna, but they crash at the Bermuda Triangle. They encounter a ghost ship at this grave of many ships and planes.
programme.sub-title: From the Ghost Ship with Love

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Foodie and gourmet aficionado Baron Gourmel says he wants to eat Lupin's brain. He claims he'd offer his own 70-million dollar jewelry collection to anyone who could capture Lupin. Fujiko hears of it and informs Lupin right away.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin III learns that his grandfather Arsne Lupin's secret treasures are buried in his grave. Lupin learns of its location with Fujiko's microfilm.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are surrounded, as usual, as they are trying to escape after a jewelry theft. But somebody shoots at Zenigata and hits him dead on. Lupin learns of the even the next morning in the papers, and Fujiko and Goemon get implicated.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of the Duchy of Blanco has a one-of-a-kind gold coin of Hannibal hidden in his chest; well, Lupin and crew are after it. Amidst their scheming, Jigen is challenged to a duel with a man named Stoneman.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The prime minister of France has run up a ridiculous tab with Maxim of Paris, and orders the Louvre Museum proprietor to sell a painting to cover his bill. But the proprietor doesn't want to let it go, and takes the painting out of the museum.
programme.sub-title: The Ultra Operation in the Train

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin recieves a letter about Marie Antoinette's jeweled crown, and sneaks into the palace of Versailles. A young man called Oscar appears, the sender of the letter.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin was told by Fujiko to steal a pistol of the Wilhem family worth 500 million pounds. Meanwhile, a man named Jim Benkei, a giant of a man who's stirred troubled in London, steals Jigen's favorite Magnum ...

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin is after the various jewels at the World Fair in Los Angeles. Lupin learns from Fujiko that a man named Harry Satler is also after the jewels, so he decides to go see who this guy is. The man he meets is a wizened old man
programme.sub-title: The Wolf Looked at an Angel!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Pestered by Fujiko, Lupin has to steal a golden bed that was originally made by Louis XIV for Josephine. He makes a plan with Jigen and Goemon, but the owner of the bed, Morgan, is a formidable opponent who has WWII military experience.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The Heike Clan and Minamoto Clan once battled on Devil's Head Island at the inland sea of Seto; Fujiko and Lupin go there to find out about the details behind the legend of the battle.
programme.sub-title: The Mystery of Demon's Head Island

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Vivian dreams of becoming a star some day, but her auditions are a bust. She thinks of using Lupin to become famous; she makes Lupin engage in thievery, and informs reporters to be at the site to catch him in the act.
programme.sub-title: A Cat for You! Dried Bonito for Me!

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Louis XIV and Marie Antoinette's Hope Diamond has brought much misfortune on its possessors. The diamond is now safeguarded by a maximum security device. Fujiko provokes Lupin to steal that diamond.
programme.sub-title: The Wedding Ring is a Cursed Trap

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and crew go to a hot spring. Lupin and Jigen relax while Goemon trains at the cliffs. A girl manifests to Goemon and captures Goemon's heart. However, the girl is seeking the secret of his sword, for her swordsmith grandfather

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin has to battle a hitman called Tiger. Lupin tries to dodge him, but Tiger is one step ahead of him. Lupin keeps trying to escape him but Tiger is relentless; he has a way of disappearing and appearing at will.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Lupin and friends go to have fun at the horse race track, but winning isn't as easy as stealing. Lupin notices two people who are winning big money hand over fist, and gets suspicious.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Catherine rescues Lupin and Jigen, who are pursued by Zenigata as usual. She's an old acquaintance of Jigen's, and provokes Jigen to steal a 140-karat diamond from her own mansion.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: Wolf and Rose are a cool hitmen duo with the ambition of rising to the top of the hitman business by killing Lupin. They capture Goemon and torture him to confess about Lupin's weaknesses. Lupin learns that Goemon is in danger.

programme.title: Lupin the 3rd, Part 2
programme.desc: The chief of the police department accused of mismanagement on Lupin's release, hit the prime minister out of anger and was dismissed. Zenigata thinks that Lupin is the only arrest to avenge the chief's death, and starts an operation.

programme.desc: Donna faces a professional crossroads. Joanie takes a trip. Joe unveils Comet's new look. Cameron asks a favor from a one-time collaborator.

programme.desc: Donna celebrates a milestone with her closest allies. Cameron contemplates saying goodbye. Joe confronts an uncertain future.

programme.title: A Saga Viking
programme.desc: Um grupo de cruis vikings vai Gr-Bretanha com a inteno de saquear. Mas os seus planos mudam quando enfrentam uma tempestade que os deixa nufragos na costa escocesa. Encalhados, aventuram-se at chegar a Danelaw, o distante acampamento viking.

programme.title: Operao Zodaco
programme.desc: Um homem procura o mundo para um conjunto de artefatos msticos - 12 cabeas de bronze dos animais do zodaco chins.

programme.title: Morte Por Encomenda
programme.desc: Detetive contratado para encontrar uma stripper, mas tudo se complica quando quem ele questiona acaba morto.

programme.title: O Imperador
programme.desc: Aps se tornar alvo de seu irmo mais velho, o herdeiro de um trono decide procurar a ajuda de sua irm e de um cavaleiro desacreditado, Jacob (Nicolas Cage), que precisa enfrentar vrios problemas pessoais. Juntos, eles buscam o apoio de Gallain (Hayden Christensen), um lendrio cavaleiro conhecido como Fantasma Branco.

programme.title: Sobibor
programme.desc: O oficial sovitico, Alexander Pechersky, organiza uma revolta e fuga em massa de prisioneiros do campo de extermnio de Sobibr, em outubro de 1943.

programme.title: A Espada De Deus - A ltima Cruzada
programme.desc: Dois cavaleiros cristos chegam a uma ilha remota com a inteno de converter os aldees pagos sua religio. O primeiro busca conquist-los com compreenso e humildade, enquanto o segundo confia na intimidao e na violncia. medida que a ruptura se forma, os aldees devem decidir de que lado esto, e os homens, at onde esto dispostos a ir e quanto sangue ser derramado.

programme.title: Dummie A Mmia e a Tumba de Achnetut
programme.desc: Dummie est com saudades de casa e quer voltar para visitar o tmulo de seus pais.

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso
programme.desc: Um menino envolvido em uma aventura de espionagem quando acidentalmente acorda um agente do servio secreto. Juntos, eles tentam resolver um misterioso crime sem soluo h quarenta anos.

programme.title: Sharky, o Pequeno Pirata
programme.desc: Destemido e cheio de risadas. O Capito Sharky e sua animada tripulao partem para aventuras emocionantes e assustadoras, nas quais aprendem que, mais do que ser o pirata mais temvel, preciso ser um bom amigo

programme.title: Bons Pra Cachorro
programme.desc: Uma histria de amizade e aventura entre Josh, um co do campo desalinhado, descontrado e amigvel, e Cassie, uma cadela mimada da cidade, que no gosta da vida no campo. Eles logo descobrem que no so to diferente do que imaginavam e, juntos, formam uma grande equipe para proteger seu lar

programme.title: O Resgate da Princesa
programme.desc: Uma histria da era dos valentes cavaleiros, belas princesas e feiticeiros malignos. Ruslan, um artista que sonha em se tornar um cavaleiro, conhece e se apaixona pela bela Mila, sem perceber que ela filha do Rei.

programme.title: Nada para sempre
programme.desc: Embora Norman e Paul, filhos de um pastor protestante, tenham recebido uma educao rgida, eles tambm desfrutaram de liberdade. Norman, um jovem reservado e criterioso, professor e est apaixonado. Paul, extrovertido, jornalista e leva uma vida desordenada. Apesar de tudo, h uma coisa que sempre os manter juntos: o rio selvagem que atravessa Montana, onde aprenderam a pescar.

programme.title: Um Anjo em Minha Vida
programme.desc: Com a ajuda de um anjo da guarda, uma adolescente rica e mimada aprende que o verdadeiro valor est em ajudar os outros.

programme.title: O Cachorro que salvou o Vero
programme.desc: Quando o co Zeus destri uma importante festa da famlia Bannister, ele enviado para uma escola de treinamento. As crianas Bannister contam com a ajuda de um treinador, que tem seus prprios mtodos de treinamento. Ser que as novas habilidades de Zeus podero ajud-lo a frustrar um trio de ladres desastrados determinados a fazer deste um vero irritante?

programme.title: Espio Por Acaso

programme.title: A Colnia
programme.desc: Na nova era glacial, um grupo de sobreviventes luta para proteger a humanidade de uma ameaa muito mais selvagem do que a natureza.

programme.title: Acima de Qualquer Suspeita
programme.desc: C.J. Nichols (Jesse Metcalfe) um jornalista investigativo disposto a denunciar o famoso promotor Mark Hunter (Michael Douglas), franco candidato a governador, por manipular provas em seus processos. Para isso, decide expor os perigos da evidncia circunstancial, que pode levar um inocente a ser condenado, vai preso por um assassinato que no cometeu, mas seu plano comea a dar errado e a sua priso pode ser definitiva.

programme.title: A Maldio do Castelo Margam
programme.desc: Uma equipe de parapsiclogos americanos viaja ao Pas de Gales para realizar um estudo no Castelo de Margam, um dos edifcios mais assombrados do Reino Unido.

programme.title: Mortos Vivos
programme.desc: Um xerife deve resgatar uma famlia afastada de uma montanha durante uma erupo vulcnica

programme.title: Uma Histria de Amor e Fria
programme.desc: Gira em torno do amor entre um heri imortal e Janana, a mulher por quem ele est apaixonado h 600 anos, atravs da colonizao, escravido, domnio militar e o futuro do Brasil em 2096, em meio s guerras da gua.

programme.title: Aprisionados
programme.desc: Realizado em uma delegacia de polcia remota, um estranho misterioso toma conta das mentes e das almas de todos dentro.

programme.title: Baile de Formatura
programme.desc: Enquanto um grupo de adolescentes se prepara para o baile de formatura, eles no sabem que um assassino est em busca de vingana. Uma noite de celebrao rapidamente se transforma em um terrvel banho de sangue... e todos so suspeitos.

programme.title: A Colnia

programme.title: Sequestro Relmpago
programme.desc: Lorraine, uma me solteira desamparada e seu filho de 8 anos, so sequestrados por Roy, um violento ladro de bancos, que a obriga a dirigir atravs do pas para encontrar o cmplice que est com o dinheiro do roubo. A luta de Lorraine pela sobrevivncia marca o incio de sua jornada rumo liberdade.

programme.title: Laos de um Crime
programme.desc: Quando a polcia descobre uma jovem brutalmente assassinada, os irmos Joe Fairburn (Paul Bettany) e Chrissie Fairburn se juntam ao seu supervisor, Robert (Mark Strong), para investigar o principal suspeito: Jason Buliegh, um criminoso sexual. Forados a liberar Jason da custdia da polcia, os Fairburns tomam o assunto em suas prprias mos; sufocados pela sombra de seu pai.

programme.title: Inimigo Em Casa
programme.desc: Quando Danny testemunha o assassinato de um homem por seu padrasto Rick, o pai de Danny, Frank, precisa proteger seu filho do maior perigo.

programme.title: Vincent N Roxxy
programme.desc: Vincent (Emile Hirsch) um solitrio em uma pequena cidade e Roxxy (Zo Kravitz) uma rebelde roqueira. Quando ambos correm perigo por se envolverem, em diferentes circunstncias, com um temido criminoso, eles se apaixonam, descobrindo que a violncia os seguir para qualquer lugar.

programme.title: Jogo de Xadrez
programme.desc: Mina foi parar atrs das grades aps um crime de corrupo. Mas o mandante, o senador Franco, usa sua influncia para mant-la presa e abafar o caso.

programme.title: Federal
programme.desc: O Delegado Vital e o agente Dani esto frente de uma operao do Comando de Operaes Tticas da Polcia Federal do Brasil para capturar o playboy brasiliense Carlos Beque, envolvido com o trfico internacional de cocana.

programme.title: Segurana Nacional
programme.desc: O governo brasileiro lidera os pases latino-americanos na luta contra os cartis de drogas. Em resposta, os cartis de drogas iniciam uma srie de ataques contra as cidades e os recursos naturais do Brasil.

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro
programme.desc: Na dcada de 60, Chester e Colette so um casal que decide fazer turismo na Grcia. Eles conhecem Rydal, um americano que os ajuda nos passeios, mas que tambm um vigarista. Porm, o guia trapaceiro descobre que os dois no so pessoas inocentes e uma estranha parceria acaba se formando.

programme.title: Donkey Xote
programme.desc: Uma histria de Don Quixote contada por um burro de Sancho Pana...

programme.title: A Histria de Wim de A a Z
programme.desc: Situado por volta de 1900, Apenstreken (A Histria de Wim de A a Z) Esta a histria do rfo Wim, que quer muito ir escola, em vez de passar todo o seu tempo trabalhando foradamente na fbrica da cidade. Com uma dose de esperteza e com a ajuda de um pequeno macaco, Wim encontra novos amigos, uma escola divertida e uma famlia amorosa.

programme.title: Minha Quase Verdadeira Histria
programme.desc: A comdia de ao se passa em 1944. Hitler aparece nele como uma pessoa fsica e mentalmente destruda que segue o conselho de Goebbels no ator-professor do campo de concentrao judeu para lies de eloquncia.

programme.title: Conduo Perigosa
programme.desc: Peter Roberts (Thomas Jane), um ex-piloto de corrida automotiva, tornou-se instrutor de motorista e durante uma de suas aulas sequestrado por Simon Keller (John Cusack), que supostamente seria um aluno como qualquer outro. O sequestrador misterioso fora ele a participar de um crime que coloca ambos na mira da polcia e da mfia, desencadeando uma perseguio.

programme.title: Terapia do Amor

programme.title: Malcolm X

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ressonncia - S2E70
programme.desc: Quando a terceira cauda aparece, Naruto s consegue ver Orochimaru. Ele est cego at para seus companheiros de equipe. Sakura atingida e cai inconsciente. Sai finalmente segue para sua misso secreta. Naruto libera a quarta cauda proibida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Meu Amigo - S2E71
programme.desc: Naruto perde a conscincia e tomado por impulsos destrutivos. Os clones de Sai e Yamato testemunham uma batalha horrvel entre Orochimaru e Naruto. O poder e a aparncia de Naruto se tornam demonacos, como se ele estivesse se transformando na Raposa.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Ameaa Se Aproxima - S2E72
programme.desc: Naruto, mesmo transformado, no desiste de trazer Sasuke para casa. Sakura ferida por Naruto, mas consegue usar seu ninjutsu para conter a agitao da Raposa de Nove Caudas. Orochimaru tenta deixar o campo de batalha, mas confrontado por Sai.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Invaso Da Akatsuki - S2E73
programme.desc: Orochimaru aceita levar Sai para o esconderijo. Yamato consegue parar a agitao de Naruto, mas os ferimentos de Naruto so graves. Quando ele volta a si, Yamato revela a ele e Sakura que Sai foi embora e que Danzo pode estar conspirando algo terrvel.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sob O Cu Estrelado - S2E74
programme.desc: Naruto e sakura ficam chocados quando descobrem que Danzo planeja trabalhar com Orochimaru. A equipe Dakashi forada a fazer uma pausa. Orochimaru percebe que est sendo seguido pelo clone de Yamato e decide usar Sai para despistar seus perseguidores.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Orao Do Velho Monge - S2E75

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Prximo Passo - S2E76

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: ltimas Palavras - S2E80

programme.title: Naraku est atrs do ltimo fragmento de Shikon e ele toma Kagome como refm.

programme.desc: Trapped townspeople (Thomas Jane, Marcia Gay Harden, Laurie Holden) face monsters inside and out after a supernatural fog engulfs their Maine community.

programme.desc: Two Navy pilots (Willem Dafoe, Brad Johnson) hatch a rogue mission to bomb Hanoi with a special low-altitude plane.

programme.title: On the Edge (2022)
programme.desc: A metro driver witnesses his son die and sets out to track down those who are responsible.

programme.title: The Salvation (2014)

programme.title: Mercy (2023)
programme.desc: An ex-military doctor finds herself in a fight for survival when the Irish mafia seizes control of the hospital at which she works. When her son is taken hostage, shes forced to rely on her battle-hardened past and lethal skills to save the day.

programme.desc: A heroin addict falls in love with a struggling sex addict, and together the pair hatch a plan to steal a small fortune from a porn star.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles (2001)

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee (1986)

programme.title: Rolling Like Thunder

programme.title: Confess, Fletch (2022)
programme.desc: While investigating a case of stolen paintings, the roguishly charming and endlessly troublesome Fletch becomes the prime suspect in a murder. To prove his innocence, he must sift through a long list of suspects -- including his own girlfriend.

programme.title: Road to Perdition (2002)
programme.desc: Accompanied by his eldest son, a Depression-era mob enforcer (Tom Hanks) seeks revenge after the rest of his family are murdered by his employers (Paul Newman) jealous son.

programme.title: Parallel (2024)

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: Whether its an anniversary, or birthday, Chef Bren is showing us some special dinners that will work for every occasion. On the menu is cheesy lobster mac and cheese and then a tarragon mustard short ribs with potatoes and veggies.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: Bren hangs out with her mom and niece Sophia. They lay out great Cuban family meals. On the menu is Carne con papa, which is a slow cooked beef stew with potatoes. Then they make Picadillo stuffed peppers with olives and raisin.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: This episode is all about delicious grilled meals with Caribbean inspired flavors. First its super simple marinated grilled chicken and shrimp kebobs served over couscous, then its Caribbean seasoned skirt steak and shrimp with rice and beans.

programme.title: Culture Kitchen
programme.desc: On this episode Bren shows us a cultural family favorite dessert. Its all about the flan! First she lays out a caramel glazed pumpkin spiced flan, then she moves onto a shaved coconut flan infused with a dash of rum.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Abby wants the feeling of balance and harmony in her bedroom. Jake creates the perfect accent wall, while Jazz lays out soft colors and textures. On the menu is steak sliders and mini red velvet waffles with ice cream and chocolate syrup.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: This busy couple wants the family room revamped for friends and family. Jake makes a custom table, while Jazz adds art, throw pillows and a new light fixture. The reveal meal is pasta with crab sauce and snicker doodle cupcakes.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: This couple wants the extra room in the home to be a "get ready" room, before leaving the house. Jake and Jazz team up to make an office/ dressing room. The reveal meal is fried beef tacos and churro ice cream sandwiches.

programme.title: Living by Design
programme.desc: Jake and Jazz deck out a family/dining room space. The room pops with black side tables made by Jake, and Jazz adds accent pieces that tie both rooms together. The meal is fettuccine with spicy chicken sausage and lemandarin pie.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Its the best way to have an authentic island meal and on the table in no time at all. Coconut Chicken curry is on the menu in this episode. Chef JJ lays out flavor on top of flavor with a delicious curry kick.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Chef JJ gets comfy at home with the ultimate recipe. A dash of good friends like Marcus Samuelsson, Chef Fairyal and Chef Airis, and lays out the perfect meal steamed clams and yucca fries.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: Chef JJ gives viewer a treat and new spin on how to prepare one of his favorite foods. He fires up the grill pan, seasons and sears tender and tasty soft shell crabs that are packed with flavor.

programme.title: Just Eats With Chef JJ
programme.desc: JJ hits the kitchen with one of the food world best and brightest Paola Velez drops by and they cook up and oxtails rice and bean and old time favorite. Then Paola give JJ a lesson on how to make the perfect black and white cookie.
